_comment_1: This file provides the browser with information about the web application, making it 'installable' and behave like a native app. It is linked in the <head> of the main HTML file: <link rel="manifest" href="/manifest.json">
_comment_name: The full name of the web application, This is shown to the user on the app's install banner and in app stores.
name: AIREC-AI-software-Quality
description: An offline tool for code quality assessment.
_comment_url: The URL that the user is directed to when they launch the application from the home screen. A value of points to the root directory.
_comment_display: The preferred display mode for the application-'standalone' makes the web app open in a dedicated window, hiding the browser'saddress bar
_comment_background: The background color of the splash screen that is shown when the application is launched from the home screen. This color is displayed before the web content loads, creating a seamless transition. It should match your main app background color
_comment_theme: The theme color of the application. This color is often used by the operating system to tint the status bar, title bar, and other UI elements.
_comment_icons: An array of icon objects. The browser will select the most appropriate icon based on the device's screen density and resolution. Providing multiple sizes ensures a high-quality icon on all devices.
